Title: "Enhancing Genre Weight for Improved Search Relevance in Azure"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdfIf you want genreto outweigh genre description, the genre field will need a much higher relative weight.JSONExtended example{    "name": "musicstoreindex",    "fields": [      { "name": "key", "type": "Edm.String", "key": true },      { "name": "albumTitle", "type": "Edm.
